description: Requestly Mock Rules for NoCap Fact-Checker

body.claim: The moon is made of green cheese.
evidence: - NASA Lunar Mission: Studies confirm the moon is composed of rock and metal. (https://nasa.gov)
- Scientific Consensus: Chemical analysis of lunar soil lacks dairy components.
body.reasoning: This is a classic myth. Scientific data from multiple lunar missions confirms the moon is a terrestrial body, not a dairy product.
